metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2616 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Inappropriate implementation in Extensions API in Google Chrome prior to104.0.5112.79 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to spoof the contents of the Omnibox (URL bar) via acrafted Chrome Extension.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
